topic.fullpath: Topic :: Desktop Environment :: K Desktop Environment (KDE)

name: kResemble
short_description:
kResemble is a KDE program for finding files on your local file system that resemble each other.
It is usable for finding file duplicates, similar files or even unique files.

"Similar" can mean (e.g.) same name, size or same width:height aspect in pic
